text:
e="preserve">José Paulo de Andrade (18 May 1942 – 17 July 2020) was a Brazilian journalist. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. He was also a radio personality and television presenter. He presented the radio programs "O Pulo do Gato" and "Jornal da Bandeirantes Gente" from Rádio Bandeirantes São Paulo.
Andrade died on 17 July 2020 in São Paulo from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and COVID-19, aged 78.
